queries.query: SELECT DB_NAME(database_id) AS [Database Name], COUNT(page_id) AS [Page Count], CAST(COUNT(*)/128.0 AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS [Buffer size(MB)] --,AVG(read_microsec) AS [Avg Read Time (microseconds)] FROM sys.dm_os_buffer_descriptors WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE database_id <> 32767 GROUP BY DB_NAME(database_id) ORDER BY [Buffer size(MB)] DESC OPTION (RECOMPILE)
